message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you might be interested in. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're looking to save a bit on the price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I can meet you halfway at $140, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to consider that?

I'm getting close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept, but I'm still a bit higher than your latest offer. I can meet you at $135, but that's as low as I can go. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go to $135. Would you be willing to meet me at $132?

I'm really close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept, and I'm starting to think that $132 is as low as I can go. I can meet you at $133, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm really close to making a decision, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go to $133. Would you be willing to meet me at $131?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $132. I've already compromised quite a bit, and I'm starting to think that's the lowest I can go. Is $132 a price you'd be willing to pay?
